alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Paulding; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:00PM EDT until July 28 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Paulding County in northwestern Georgia... Northeastern Polk County in northwestern Georgia... Southwestern Bartow County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 759 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stilesboro, or near Cartersville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cartersville, Rockmart, Euharlee, Braswell, Taylorsville, Burnt Hickory Ridge, and Stilesboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
